languages.text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.
languages.original_text: Чем ниже значение броска кубика со всеми модификаторами сложности, тем больше шансов попасть по прямой линии.

traits.locale_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.
The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.
The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

languages.text: Чем ниже значение броска кубика со всеми модификаторами сложности, тем больше шансов попасть по прямой линии.
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

languages.text: Je niedriger der Würfelwurfwert mit allen Schwierigkeitsmodifikatoren ist, desto größer ist die Chance, entlang der Zentrallinie zu treffen.
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

traits.locale_text: Je niedriger der Würfelwurfwert mit allen Schwierigkeitsmodifikatoren ist, desto größer ist die Chance, entlang der Zentrallinie zu treffen.

languages.text: Plus la valeur du jet de dés (tous modificateurs de difficulté compris) est faible, plus les chances de toucher une cible le long de la ligne centrale sont grandes.
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

traits.locale_text: Plus la valeur du jet de dés (tous modificateurs de difficulté compris) est faible, plus les chances d'infliger un coup le long de la ligne centrale sont grandes.

languages.text: 最终掷骰值（包括难度调整值）越低，命中中央弹道的几率就越高。
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

traits.locale_text: 最终掷骰值（包括难度调整值）越低，命中中央弹道的几率就越高。

languages.text: Cuanto más bajo es el valor de la tirada de dados con todos los modificadores por dificultad, mayor es la posibilidad de impactar en la línea central.
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

traits.locale_text: Cuanto más bajo es el valor de la tirada de dados con todos los modificadores por dificultad, mayor es la posibilidad de impactar en la línea central.

languages.text: 全難易度補正を加えたダイスロールの値が低いほど、中心線を沿って命中する確率が高くなる。
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.

traits.locale_text: 全難易度補正を加えたダイスロールの値が低いほど、中心線を沿って命中する確率が高くなる。

languages.text: Atılan zarın değeri tüm zorluk değiştiricileriyle birlikte ne kadar düşükse merkezî hat boyunca vurma olasılığı da o kadar yükselir.
languages.original_text: The lower the dice roll value with all difficulty modifiers is, the greater the chance of hitting along the central line is.
